Job Title: Marketing Intern

Location: Newport Beach, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
About Altura

Altura, LLC is a professional services ﬁrm focused on improving energy, environmental, and ﬁnancial performance across all levels of an organization. We go beyond traditional consulting, using a people-centric approach designed to make immediate and lasting performance improvements. Altura has deep expertise in deriving value from data systems, scaling from individual buildings to real estate portfolios. We leverage core skills in building systems engineering & commissioning, information technology, software development, and building automation system and controls, as well as industry-leading sustainability advisory services such environmental program support and integrated reporting.

Altura is actively recruiting for our internship program, and we are seeking a motivated and creative Marketing Intern to join our team. This entry-level position oﬀers a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in various aspects of marketing within a growing B2B ﬁrm, providing professional marketing services for engineering in the built environment. The ideal candidate is eager to learn, has strong communication skills, and is enthusiastic about contributing to the growth and success of our company.

You’ll work with our team across a variety of initiatives and projects during your tenure, with an assigned mentor and speciﬁc goals which will be reported on at the end of the internship. Your contributions will help drive meaningful energy and environmental performance improvements in the built environment at scale.

Summer Internship Program Overview

Our summer associate program provides a realistic view of what it’s like to work at Altura through meaningful, hands-on experiences.

Our goal is to provide you with countless opportunities for learning, growth, and career development, and we are committed to delivering an exceptional experience both professionally and personally.

In addition to gaining valuable real-world experience, you will have the opportunity to build relationships throughout the organization through activities such as community service and company events.

Key Responsibilities


Assist in the implementation of marketing strategies and campaigns to promote Altura's services and brand.Coordinating the research, planning, and of networking events, industry conferences, and other promotional activities.Support the development of engaging content for marketing materials, including blog posts, social media posts, and email newsletters.Assist with marketing campaigns across various channels to increase brand awareness and engagement.Conduct research and analysis to track the performance of marketing eﬀorts and provide insights for optimization.Collaborate with team members to brainstorm new ideas and innovative approaches to marketing.


Desired Qualiﬁcations


Currently enrolled in or recently graduated from a Bachelor's degree program, preferably in Marketing, Communications, or a related ﬁeld.Strong written and verbal communication skills, with a keen eye for detail.Basic understanding of marketing principles and concepts.Proﬁciency in Microsoft Oﬃce suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and familiarity with social media platforms. Adobe design programs and Salesforce CRM understanding is a plus.Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.Eagerness to learn and willingness to take on new challenges.


Location: Newport Beach, CA

Duration: 10 weeks (June 10th - August 16th)

Hours: Full-Time (40 hours per week); at least 3 days in oﬃce

Compensation: $20/hour

To Apply:


Please submit your application including your resume through Workday. Qualiﬁed candidates will be contacted to schedule an interview.

Experience Level (if available): Internship
